short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A form filler that fills all inputs on a page with fake/dummy data.
short.es: Un formulario de relleno que llena todas las entradas de una página con datos falsos/ficticios.
short.zh_CN: 自动填充页面中的表单.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fake Filler 2 is THE form filler to fill all input fields on a page with randomly generated fake data. This productivity boosting extension is a must for developers and testers who work with forms as it eliminates the need for manually entering values in fields.

• Fill all inputs with randomly generated names, emails, phone numbers, etc.

• Sensible defaults to allow you to start using the extension without any configuration.

• Powerful customization using custom fields.

• Ignores CAPTCHA, hidden, disabled and readonly fields.

• Blocklisting for sites you never want to fill.
long.es,zh_CN:
A form filler that fills all inputs on a page with fake/dummy data.
Fake Filler 2 is THE form filler to fill all input fields on a page with randomly generated fake data. This productivity boosting extension is a must for developers and testers who work with forms as it eliminates the need for manually entering values in fields.

• Fill all inputs with randomly generated names, emails, phone numbers, etc.

• Sensible defaults to allow you to start using the extension without any configuration.

• Powerful customization using custom fields.

• Ignores CAPTCHA, hidden, disabled and readonly fields.
